CustomField.description: true if current user has role of VP or director, used for criteria in the approval process to auto approve requests for this user type
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "VP of Operations", CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "Account Director", CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "Director Of Account Management", CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "Director of Market Operations", CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "Training Manager", CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "COO", CreatedBy.UserRole.DeveloperName = "Director of Contractor Success", CreatedBy.Profile.Name = "Ops Director" ), True, False)
CustomField.label: Director/VP Submission
